result.eng: Here's an information leaflet for you.
result.html: seo chugat bileog eolaisHere's an information leaflet for you.
result.ponchtml: seo ċugat bileog eolaisHere's an information leaflet for you.

result.eng: Because of the amount of information available.
result.ga: de bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.orig: de bharr an méid eolais atá le fáil
result.html: de bharr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.
result.ponchtml: de ḃarr an méid eolais atá le fáilBecause of the amount of information available.

result.ga: eolas faoi rún é seo
result.orig: eolas faoi rún é seo
result.html: eolas faoi rún é seoThis is confidential information.
result.ponchtml: eolas faoi rún é seoThis is confidential information.

result.eng: All the information is in the leaflet.
result.ga: tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileog
result.orig: tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileog
result.html: tá an t-eolas ar fad sa bhileogAll the information is in the leaflet.
result.ponchtml: tá an t-eolas ar fad sa ḃileogAll the information is in the leaflet.

result.eng: An information leaflet is available at request.
result.ga: tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.orig: tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidh
result.html: tá bileog eolais le fáil ach í a iarraidhAn information leaflet is available at request.

result.eng: We have asked for more information.
result.ga: tá tuilleadh eolais iarrtha againn
result.orig: tá tuilleadh eolais iarrtha againn
result.html: tá tuilleadh eolais iarrtha againnWe have asked for more information.
result.ponchtml: tá tuilleaḋ eolais iarrṫa againnWe have asked for more information.

result.eng: More information is available from the office.
result.ga: tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifig
result.orig: tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifig
result.html: tá tuilleadh eolais le fáil ón oifigMore information is available from the office.
result.ponchtml: tá tuilleaḋ eolais le fáil ón oifigMore information is available from the office.

result.eng: There is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ga: tá bileog ansin tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.orig: tá bileog ansin tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.html: tá bileog ansin tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.

result.eng: She was collecting information about various people.
result.ga: bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.orig: bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúla
result.html: bhí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi dhaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.
result.ponchtml: ḃí sí ag bailiú eolais faoi ḋaoine éagsúlaShe was collecting information about various people.

result.eng: This information is available openly in newspapers and on the Internet.
result.ga: tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuachtáin agus ar an idirlíon
result.orig: tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuachtáin agus ar an idirlíon

result.ponchtml: tá an t-eolas ar fáil go hoscailte sna nuaċtáin agus ar an idirlíonThis information is available openly in newspapers and on the Internet.

result.eng: The board was giving information about the history of the place.
result.ga: bhí an clár ag tabhairt eolais faoi stair na háite

result.eng: I translated the information into Irish for her.
result.ga: d'aistríos an t-eolas go gaeilge di

result.html: d'aistríos an t-eolas go gaeilge diI translated the information into Irish for her.

result.eng: She will be wondering why you want that information.
